title: An Amazing Visit to a New Art Therapy Studio – The White House
content:
Healthcare	

May 1, 2018
2 minute read

						Karen Pence							
Second LadyIt was so great to be back home again in Indiana. The new art therapy studio is now open at Riley Hospital for Children at IU Health in Indianapolis. To be able to spend some time in the studio with some amazing Riley Kids was a privilege. They were hard at work creating.Thank you, Emily and Cassie, for all you do.This studio space will benefit patients, their siblings and their parents for years to come. Keep up the great work! I hope to visit this summer to create another syringe art canvas!!Art therapy is near and dear to my heart. To learn more about my initiative, Art Therapy: Healing with the HeART, click here. To stay updated on our events in the Office of the Second Lady, follow us on Twitter at @SecondLady.
